reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.content: This exact product was recommended by my physical therapist. It is terrific, easy to pump (I think getting the pump with the ball is smart.), was delivered very quickly. So glad have it.

reviews.title: it works great however the ball is not round
reviews.content: I bought this to help with leg extension exercises post knee replacement. For this purpose, it works great however the ball is not round. It id very oblong and odly shaped.

reviews.title: Versatile exercise prop
reviews.content: Bought this because we were using something similar in my Barre class at the gym. Love this for doing sit ups/crunches. Reduces risk of back strain and gives a great an workout. Very versatile for numerous exercises.
